articles.title: Britain agrees exit terms with the EU. Now for Parliament to decide
articles.description: Winning support in Westminster will be harder than in Brussels
articles.content: THE TERMS of Brexit have been agreed on at last. At a summit on November 25th Theresa May, Britains prime minister, and the leaders of the 27 other members of the European Union announced that they had approved both the withdrawal agreement and a political de… [+2261 chars]
